Package hesml.configurators.icmodels

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCondProbICmodel
    This class is the base class for all the IC models in the family of well-founded IC models introduced in the paper below.
    AbstractICmodel
    This class represents an abstract Information Content model which is defined as any ITaxonomyConfigurator that sets the IC values of the vertexes (nodes) in the taxonomy.
    AdhikariICmodel
    This class implements the intrinsic IC model introduced by Adhakari et al.
    AICAouichaTaiebHamaduICmodel2016
    This class implements the IC model introduced in the paper below.
    AouichaTaiebAsGICICmodel
    This class implements the AsGIC IC model introduced by Aouicha and Hadj Taieb in the paper below: Aouicha, M.
    BlanchardICmodel
    This class implements the ICg model introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbCorpusICmodel
    This class implements the CondProbCorpus IC model introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbCosineICmodel
    This class implements the CondProbCosine IC model introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbHyponymsICmodel
    This class implements the CondProbHyponyms IC model introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbLeavesICmodel
    This class implements the CondProbLeaves IC model introduced in the following paper.
    CondProbLogisticICmodel
    This class implements the CondProbLogistic IC model introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbRefinedCorpusICmodel
    This class implements the IC model called CondProbRefCorpus that is introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbRefinedCosineICmodel
    This class implements the IC model called CondProbRefCosine that is introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbRefinedCosineLeavesICmodel
    This class implements the IC model called CondProbRefCosineLeaves that is introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbRefinedHypoICmodel
    This class implements the IC model called CondProbRefHyponyms that is introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbRefinedLeavesICmodel
    This class implements the IC model called CondProbRefLeaves that is introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbRefinedLeavesSubsumers
    This class implements an unpublished IC model called CondProbRefLeavesSubsumers that belongs to the family introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbRefinedLeavesSubsumersRatio
    This class implements the IC model called CondProbRefLeavesSubsumersRatio that is introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbRefinedLogisticICmodel
    This class implements the IC model called CondProbRefLogistic that is introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbRefinedLogisticLeavesICmodel
    This class implements the IC model called CondProbRefLogisticLeaves that is introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbRefinedSubsumedLeavesRatio
    This class implements the IC model called CondProbRefSubsumedLeavesRatio that is introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbRefinedUniformICmodel
    This class implements the IC model called CondProbRefUniform that is introduced in the paper below.
    CondProbUniformICmodel
    This class implements the CondProbUniform IC model introduced in the paper below.
    CorpusResnikICmodel
    This class implements the corpus-based IC model introduced by Resnik in the paper below.
    HadjTaieb2013ICmodel
    This class implements the IC model introduced in the paper below.
    HadjTaiebHypoValueICmodel
    This class implements the HypoValue function introduced in the paper below.
    Harispe2012ICmodel
    This function implements an unpublished method developed by Harispe as a modification of the Sánchez et al.
    ICModelsFactory
    This class creates the instances of all the IC models, either intrinsic or corpus-based.
    Meng2012ICmodel
    This class implements the IC model introduced in the paper below.
    PedersenFilesICmodel
    This class implements the reader of the WN-based frequency files used by the corpus-based IC models in this library.
    Sanchez2011ICmodel
    This class set the IC values for the nodes according to the IC model introduced by Sánchez et al.
    Sanchez2012ICmodel
    This class implements the IC-computation method introduced in the paper below.
    SecoICmodel
    This class implements the Seco et al IC model introduced in the paper below.
    Yuan2013ICmodel
    This function implements the Yuan et al.
    ZhouICmodel
    This class implements the Zhou et al.
